definition: see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]

to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
surname Che
war chariot (archaic)/rook (in Chinese chess)/rook (in chess)
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to transfer (ownership, rights etc)
to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
to change/to transform/shift/transformation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to change/to switch/to convert/to transform
transformation/to transform

to get lost/to lose one's way
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
to change/to transform/isomerization (chemistry)
to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement

to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]

sentences.english: Please also note that the University may not entertain any request in future fot transfer of curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 是指香港大學不接受任何轉專業的請求嗎？

sentences.english: I'm afraid all calls to guest room must go through the operator.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，所有打到客房的電話都要通過我們接線生轉。

sentences.english: The gander circled the pond for days, and more days after that.
sentences.chinese: 那雄鵝成天圍着池塘轉，日復一日。

sentences.english: When the dog is alert, the orifices turn forward and the outer edges are vertical.
sentences.chinese: 當他警惕時，耳朵向前轉，外側邊緣垂直。

sentences.english: Despite of that, I kept still doing my things, walking and thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我管不了那麼多，依舊自己轉自己的，邊走邊想。

sentences.english: In America this public-to-private switch has been relatively successful.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，這種“公共轉私人”的轉變算是較爲成功的。

sentences.english: Our geology teacher said that the earth moves aroud the sun.
sentences.chinese: 地理老師說地球圍繞太陽轉。

sentences.english: The restoring sources of "No. 117A" are wide and it is easy for transbreeding new sterility lines.
sentences.chinese: 此種材料恢復源廣，轉育新的不育系也較容易。

sentences.english: When a reinsurer purchases reinsurance, we call it retrocession.
sentences.chinese: 當再保險人購買再保險時，我們稱爲轉分保。

sentences.english: Mechanically I obeyed, turned eastwards, and with my cutlass raised, ran round the corner of the house.
sentences.chinese: 我機械地服從命令向東轉，舉着彎刀跑步繞過屋角。

sentences.english: That the earth circles about the sun once is called a year.
sentences.chinese: 地球圍太陽轉一圈稱爲一年。

sentences.english: Anyone can go out and take thousands of uninteresting landscape photos.
sentences.chinese: 任何人出去轉一圈都能拍幾千張乏味的照片回來。

sentences.english: It looks like the dial only turns clockwise in either 3 or 4 increments.
sentences.chinese: 看起來這個轉盤只能按順時針方向轉3到4格。

sentences.english: S. because of the gas -- it has unique technologies in oil and converting gas to liquids.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司擁有獨特的石油以及天然氣轉液體技術。

sentences.english: Venus will turn Retrograde in Scorpio, putting a strong focus on sexuality and intimate relationships.
sentences.chinese: 金星會在天蠍座逆行轉，強烈關注性和親密關係。

sentences.english: How would you relay advice to new clubs?
sentences.chinese: 你如何將忠告轉傳給新社？

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
